title: 1.12载入地图时崩溃
txt_content:
如题，求助0.0
崩溃日志如下。
===================================
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Don't be sad, have a hug! <3

Time: 6/16/19 2:18 PM
Description: Unexpected error

java.lang.NullPointerException: Unexpected error
        at ams.a(SourceFile:1173)
        at buo.h(SourceFile:1614)
        at buo.a(SourceFile:1203)

-- System Details --

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
卸载原有的 java ，安装这个 https://javadl.oracle.com/webapp ... b78b671c754eaaf38ab

然后，在启动器中分配更多的内存

我觉得是内存不足的原因

xmdhs 发表于 2019-6-16 14:39
卸载原有的 java ，安装这个 https://javadl.oracle.com/webapps/download/AutoDL?BundleId=238729_478a62b ...
已解决，感谢！
